targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$host", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$host"}[$__rate_interval])))
